items.sentence: I\'m planning a surprise birthday party for Tom.
Everyone but Tom seems to be enjoying the party.
I can\'t tell you how stupid this makes me feel.
I couldn\'t figure out what Tom was going to do.
Where did you find the inspiration for all this?
Do you really think that I\'m going to help you?
Tom probably won\'t be the first one to do that.
Tom promised he\'d call as soon as he got there.
Do I have to schedule an appointment to see you?
Do you have any idea why Tom refused to do that?
Are you sure the boss will let us go home early?
Are you sure you want to throw all of this away?
I think that\'s why Tom didn\'t want to do that.
Tom couldn\'t do anything he was supposed to do.
Tom couldn\'t find his way back to the campsite.
Tom couldn\'t find the words to express himself.
There are about thirty students in Tom\'s class.
Can you tell me why you weren\'t here yesterday?
I know that you know that I know that Tom knows.
Where did Tom get the money to pay for all this?
